title: Shake’s Big Shot, Zion Bounces Back, and the Jimmy Butler Mystery | The Mismatch
description:
Verno and KOC react to Shake Milton’s clutch game-winner against the Spurs (0:43), the fight for the 8-seed (13:26), the micro-ball Rockets (23:40), the defending champion Toronto Raptors (41:21), the bizarre Jimmy Butler story (50:06), and more.

Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor
